name: sombreness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
seriousness and sadness: They drank their tea, a sombreness in their manner. You can sense the collective sombreness at the team's hotel.
(of a place, clothes, etc.) darkness: The great candles served only to accentuate the gloom and sombreness of the hall. It is a place of the most staggering sombreness, grandeur, and gloom. See
sombre
More examplesFewer examplesTheir happiness was tinged with sombreness.His mood changed suddenly, the sombreness vanishing as if it had never been there.The sombreness of the church was relieved only by the wall-paintings.
